item.title: 美联储称将于 12 月 12 日开始购买国债
item.description: 美联储表示，将从 12 月 12 日开始每月购买 400 亿美元的国库券，因为美联储希望重建金融系统的储备，因为在美联储收紧资产负债表的同时，金融系统的储备正在减少。【原文：The Federal Reserve said it will begin buying $40 billion of Treasury bills per month starting Dec. 12 as it’s looking to rebuild reserves in the financial system which dwindled while it was tightening its balance sheet.】

item.title: 红木公司、银点公司挑选 Klöckner Pentaplast 董事会成员
item.description: Redwood Capital Management LLC 和 Silver Point Capital LP 将分别任命一名董事进入 Klöckner Pentaplast 董事会，一旦这家原由 Strategic Value Partners LLC 拥有的包装公司摆脱破产困境。【原文：Redwood Capital Management LLC and Silver Point Capital LP will each appoint a director to Klöckner Pentaplast’s board once the packaging firm formerly owned by Strategic Value Partners LLC emerges from bankruptcy.】

item.title: 前 Pimco 经理 Devlin 押注美国和加拿大收益率曲线将趋于稳定
item.description: 基金管理公司 Devlin Capital Inc. 正准备应对北美两大经济体收益率曲线的进一步陡峭化，因为各国政府为支付减税、军事项目和其他优先事项而出现巨额预算赤字。【原文：Fund manager Devlin Capital Inc. is getting ready for further steepening in the yield curve in North America’s two largest economies as governments run large budget deficits to pay for tax cuts, military projects and other priorities.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长马克鲁夫 "确信 "中期通胀率将达到 2
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员加布里埃尔-马克鲁夫（Gabriel Makhlouf）表示，消费者价格涨幅越来越有可能达到 2% 的目标。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Gabriel Makhlouf said it’s increasingly likely that consumer-price gains will settle at the 2% goal.】

item.title: 苹果公司库克就儿童网络安全法向美国立法者施压
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc.首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）周三会见了美国立法者，游说他们反对即将出台的儿童网络安全立法中要求应用程序商店运营商验证用户年龄的条款。【原文：Apple Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook met with US lawmakers on Wednesday to lobby against provisions in pending children’s online safety legislation that would require app store operators to authenticate users’ ages.】

item.title: 乌克兰再次袭击俄罗斯影子舰队石油船
item.description: 乌克兰再次袭击了一艘与俄罗斯石油贸易有关的影子船队油轮，继续打击莫斯科重要的海上石油贸易。【原文：Ukraine carried out yet another attack on a shadow-fleet tanker linked to Russia’s oil trade as it continues to target Moscow’s vital seaborne petroleum trade.】

item.title: 矿工补缴欠款后马里清偿国内欠款
item.description: 马里已下令向当地公司支付 3 120 亿非洲法郎（约合 5.54 亿美元），以清偿 2023 年和 2024 年提供服务的欠款，此前，马里在实施新的采矿法过程中从矿工那里收回了 7 610 亿非洲法郎，使国家财政得到了加强。【原文：Mali has ordered the payment of 312 billion CFA francs ($554 million) to local companies to clear arrears for services provided in 2023 and 2024, after state finances were bolstered in the wake of recovering 761 billion CFA francs from miners in the application of a new mining code.】

item.title: 谷歌法国资产成为其已解散的俄罗斯部门的目标
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下谷歌公司的俄罗斯清算人申请没收该公司在法国的部分资产，这是俄罗斯法院与国际公司之间关系紧张的最新例证。【原文：The Russian liquidator of Alphabet Inc.’s Google arm filed an order to seize some of the firm’s assets in France, in the latest example of the tension between Russian courts and international firms.】

item.title: 格里尔对欧盟在贸易协议后对待美国技术的态度表示 "失望
item.description: 就在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 社交网络因违反欧盟有争议的内容节制法而被处以 1.2 亿欧元（约合 1.4 亿美元）罚款的几天后，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的最高贸易谈判代表表示，他对欧盟能否兑现公平监管美国科技巨头的承诺感到担忧。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s top trade negotiator said he’s concerned by the European Union’s follow-through on pledges to regulate American tech giants fairly, just days after Elon Musk’s X social network was slapped with a €120 million ($140 million) fine for violating the EU’s controversial content-moderation law.】

item.title: 快餐连锁店莱昂将裁员和倒闭归咎于英国税收
item.description: Leon 计划裁员并关闭部分餐厅，这家英国快餐连锁店批评 "该行业的税收负担不可持续"。【原文：Leon plans to cut staff and close some of its restaurants, as the British fast-food chain criticized the “unsustainable tax burden on the sector.”】

item.title: Brightline 的对冲基金债券持有人准备进行债务重组
item.description: 持有 Brightline 11 亿美元公司债务股份的对冲基金正在制定一项计划，通过向陷入困境的高速铁路项目提供新的融资和优惠，将其债权提升到其他类似债权人之上。【原文：Hedge funds with a stake in Brightline’s $1.1 billion of corporate debt are crafting a plan to elevate their claims over other similar creditors by offering new financing and concessions to the struggling high-speed rail project.】

item.title: Ares 首席执行官解释为何不与传统公司合作
item.description: Ares Management Corp. 一直拒绝与其他基金管理公司合作，以通过 401（k）市场等方式接触普通投资者，尽管其他公司也与更传统的公司合作，为大众进行投资。【原文：Ares Management Corp. has resisted partnering with other money managers to reach everyday investors, including through the 401(k) market, even as others team up with more traditional firms to invest for the masses.】

item.description: Netflix 是一家依靠垃圾债券发展起来的公司，目前正寻求再次大量借贷。【原文：Netflix, a company that built its business on junk bonds, is looking to borrow heavily again.】

item.title: 卡纳科尔在重组努力中从债券持有人处获得一线生机

item.title: YouTube TV 将提供新的订阅捆绑服务，包括体育节目

item.title: 瑞士改进后的 15%美国关税协议将追溯适用
item.description: 瑞士上个月达成的让美国降低对瑞士关税的协议将追溯到协议宣布当天生效。【原文：Switzerland’s agreement last month to get the US to lower tariffs on the country will be backdated to take effect on the day the deal was announced.】

item.title: 特朗普团队延长卢克石油制裁豁免期限，协议谈判重回正轨
item.description: 随着卢克石油公司国外资产出售交易讨论的加快，美国将对该公司部分交易的制裁豁免延长至下个月。【原文：The US extended a sanctions waiver for some Lukoil PJSC transactions until next month as deal discussions over the sale of the firm’s foreign assets picked up.】

item.title: 印度向更广泛的投资开放 1770 亿美元养老金池
item.description: 作为投资规范全面更新的一部分，印度养老金监管机构扩大了国民养老金体系基金经理的投资机会，允许他们更深入地参与股票、债券和另类资产投资。【原文：India’s pension regulator has broadened investment opportunities for National Pension System fund managers, allowing deeper participation in equities, bonds and alternative assets as part of a sweeping update to investment norms.】

item.title: 加拿大养老金巨头对支付费用与私募基金共同投资表示反对
item.description: 全球最大的投资公司之一加拿大养老金计划投资委员会不太可能与私募股权管理公司合作，因为后者会开始向与他们一起投资交易的机构投资者索要费用。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board, one of the largest investment firms globally, is unlikely to partner with private equity managers that start demanding fees from institutional investors who invest alongside them in deals.】

item.title: Opendoor 投资者引发 Nextdoor 股价上涨近 50%
item.description: Nextdoor Holdings Inc.周三早盘股价大涨49%，创下四年多来最大涨幅，原因是Opendoor Technologies和Better Home &等零售业巨头的幕后推手Finance Holding Co.看好这款邻里社交媒体应用。【原文：Nextdoor Holdings Inc. shares surged as much as 49% early Wednesday, the most in over four years, as the man behind the retail-driven rally in names like Opendoor Technologies and Better Home & Finance Holding Co. took a bullish stance on the neighborhood social media app.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将利率维持在 2.25%，经济 "总体保持稳定
item.description: 加拿大央行维持利率稳定，并表示尽管经济似乎比之前想象的更具韧性，但目前的借贷成本水平仍适合减轻贸易战的损害。【原文：The Bank of Canada held interest rates steady and said although the economy appears to be more resilient than previously thought, the current level of borrowing costs is still appropriate to mitigate the trade war damage.】

item.title: 组织称黄金上涨推动全球非法采矿激增
item.description: 据世界黄金协会称，黄金价格的飙升正在推动非正规和无监管的黄金开采业迅速扩张，而这种开采业往往是非法的，对生态环境具有破坏性。【原文：The surge in gold prices is driving a rapid expansion in informal and unregulated gold mining that is often illegal and ecologically destructive, according to the World Gold Council.】
